website_summaries.verdict: Versatile men's road bike that works extremely well for many different road riding conditions.
pros: Plenty of options with 6 different sizes and 3 different color combinations in a sharp-looking bicycle
Designed to maximize the rider's comfort for long distance rides
24 speed options to give you an edge on either hilly or flat roads
cons: Model is pricier than some others

customer_reviews.title: Why would you buy anything else?
customer_reviews.text: Received bike in four days from ordering. After a few adjustments, I’ve rode approx 50 miles so far with it. Quite honestly, I don’t know why anyone would need a more expensive bike. I have a $2500 Klien full suspension mountain bike with all Shimano XTR components and to be honest, this Tommaso is equally as good. Only thing I changed so far is the seat. I prefer comfort over styling. This Tommaso is well worth the price and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Long time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6’2 large
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bike. I’m 6’2 I purchased a large and fits me very well. However I did have a hiccup. Wheels do come bent so be ready to dish out money to repair them. I emailed customer service and they did get back to me but they didn’t do anything to accommodate me. There customer service is a bit suspect. Two thumbs up for the bike Two thumbs down for the Customer service.
customer_reviews.author: D0pecOuture

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t take it from me. Go read the reviews online. This is a fantastic bike for the price. Most likely a top five in the under $600 category. It does require assembly which is why I gave it two stars in easy to assemble category This is good for two reasons first you won’t mess it up trying to put it together yourself. Second it has high end parts which do require a professional to assemble and adjust. The shifting is butter smooth and the bike is ultra light. I bought it because my mountain bike was just too slow on the concrete walkways I ride. You will not be disappointed with this road bike.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Decent entry level bike
customer_reviews.text: Decent entry level bike. It’s really light which allows me to comfortably carry it over a flight of stairs to my first floor apartment. The seat is tiny and practically unusable unless you are an athlete at peak fitness and have a baby sized butt. Had to buy a gel seat. One of the tubes just blew out in less than 20 days and the seller wouldn’t own up to selling me a defective tube. I too felt silly for mailing them not knowing that tubes cost less than 10$. Not impressed with the seller making me feel stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Abhay Bhangale

customer_reviews.title: Beginner/Even-expert? You will be impressed with quality/performance/price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bike, worth every penny. 1. If you are beginner with quality bike for Money (not overpriced) please go for this one. 2. my first ride, took 20miles ride, Excellent performance. 3. great strong look 4. Light weight, surprisingly this bike is lighter than $1000 bike. 5. Included price for bike assembly is really impressive. Got my bike assembled at my home. I am pleased enough to take time for review. Will possibly comeback to update after few months.
customer_reviews.author: avp

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Road Bike For The Price.
customer_reviews.text: I've ridden over 500 miles now and feel confident saying that this bike is the perfect balance of price and quality. When looking for a bike most were either way too expensive to justify for my experience level, or too cheap and poor quality to be dependable. This bike gives me a great ride and I've been loving it. My only complaint would be the I ordered the black version and got the white one instead, which is a little more difficult to keep clean, but since it has no bearing on the functionality it's not the worst. Overall I would completely recommend this bike for those getting into the cycling sport.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V.

customer_reviews.title: Honestly underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: Bike looks great, and if you're interested in quick trips to the store or a ride around the park this product will be able to accomplish that. Not for cyclists, new or experienced. The gears are sluggish and unresponsive. The frame is noticeably heavier than a typical road bike. Summary: Its a bike so if you get on and pedal it will move, but you may want to spend money on a better used bike or save and get a different product for endurance cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike.
customer_reviews.text: I've ridden this bike for a few months now and I really like it. I replaced the pedals and attached a water bottle and bike pump to the frame. Since I worked in bike shops in the past I was able to make adjustments myself with the help of a bike stand I purchased. So it's best to have a bike shop tune it up etc... if you are not a bike mechanic. Overall a great experience and I would recommend the bike to someone looking for this type of bike.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Albro

customer_reviews.title: person came to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We were a little worried ordering a bike from online but saw the reviews and it turned out great. My fiance knew how to set up a bike so we actually did it early (not recommended for a beginner to do), but then there is a company/person that comes out with a bike van that is actually there to set up your bike. So they came and just fixed minor things for his and it has worked great since. He did have to buy the little toe grabber part, but that was a person preference. He rates it a 4 because it has the gear ratio of a mountain bike, not of a road bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler McCurley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike. Its my first step up to a quality road bike. Been riding a cheap walmart Kent bike for 2 years, and finally decided to upgrade. One my first ride my average speed was up nearly 2 mph on one of the usual routes. The layout is more comfortable, everything works smoothly, and compared to the old bike its almost effortless to pedal. Well worth the money and i can tell im gonna be putting many more miles on this bike.
customer_reviews.author: smk03

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was able to ride the bike twice before it started to fall apart. Seller refused to remedy the situatuation. The warranty, which is not posted on the product page, is ineffective in most situations. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great beautiful bike
customer_reviews.text: I'm a casual rider,but I love the bike. It's light, very elegant, and super fast. It came mostly put together and not hard to assemble. Unfortunately the wheels came without rim strips, which deflated the tubes when I rode them. But the seller sent me rim strips and new inner tubes. Seller support was very professional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value -very nice fast comfortable bike for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is bike is an excellent value for the price. It's light and fast. It is my first "modern "road bike in twenty years since I found that my decent French 10 speed could not handle the pot holes of everyday commuting and I switched to hybrid to get around the city. This bike is a lot more comfortable than my old 10 speed, and had a good range of gears for speed and big hills. My only suggestion is to replace the cheap but functional pedals with clip-less pedals, or better yet, pedals with cages if you regularly ride in heavy traffic. You'll get a lot more power on hills.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Ruffins

customer_reviews.title: Misled by product description.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike in January 2018 as an xxs- hts. 4’6”-5’1”. The bike I received was way too big for me-5’1”, my grandson who is 5’4” is a perfect fit. I contacted the company who told me to adjust the seat - all of their bikes are made like this- so I did to no avail- still o” stand over room.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie moreland

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Unsure about the assembly.. we paid for professional assembly, as it avoids the warranty if not. Seems like a great quality bike... however, the extra small states it is for 410 -5'2. My wife is 4'11 and it's just barely too big for her. She can use it... but it's clearly not her size.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: This is a gorgeous bike
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to road bikes and didn't have $1k+ to drop on a fancy road bike and to be honest, I don't care anymore. This bike is gorgeous and it rides so well. I'm glad I found this bike. It's now my daily commuter bike and will be the bike I use for my big ride from San Fran to L.A. in 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike
customer_reviews.text: Used all the gears from easy to moderate climbs and downhills and they all worked just fine. Easy to handle and it's fast.Shifting is super smooth and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Mario L.

customer_reviews.title: This bike is just fantastic and it was shipped quickly and ready for pickup ...
customer_reviews.text: This bike is just fantastic and it was shipped quickly and ready for pickup within a week. The bike is better than I had expected so I was very pleased when I picked it up and the technican walked me through the operation and even he commented that this is a great bike for the price.
customer_reviews.author: roland ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Bike!
customer_reviews.text: I had a local bike shop - Round Trip of Casa Grande, AZ do the work on the bike - use a local shop with extensive knowledge / create a relationship with the guys and I got a great bike put together with follow up work
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike! I'm been riding it regularly for a few months now and the only complaint I have is that some of the paint on the frame scratched off. Just be careful when leaving your bike up against things and you shouldn't have a problem. I'm also probably going to add a little wider/deeper wheel set in the near future for better performance so that may be something to look into.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Keith

customer_reviews.title: otherwise the bike was good. I would still recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.text: Both of its wheels were out of their alignment or true, so I had to bring it to a bike shop and spend a little bit more, otherwise the bike was good. I would still recommend it to a friend. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: ferdinand san pedro

customer_reviews.title: Great Youth Bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike fits my 12 year old son well, he's about 5' tall and 80lbs. The bike has nice components but is pretty heavy. We paid $50 to have it professionally set up and will need to take it back again to have it fine tuned. Make sure you have a professional set up the bike or you risk injury to the rider or damage to the bike. The bike is sleek and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Nemetz

customer_reviews.title: A+ experience w seller and amazing road bike - buy it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bike. Brakes were too far forward for me but was relatively cheap to have the local bike shop retake it. GiantNerd even sent me replacement tape free. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike because I needed a road bike. My commuter bike is much heavier and harder to ride. I reviewed bikes and found this one had great reviews and it has all the components I want. It is 10 pounds lighter than my commuter. It rides smoothly and looks great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, Great price, Great service
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike, it’s listed as a good bike for beginner racers. It arrived disassembled but amazon set me up with a master builder for $50. I ordered the burnt orange and it’s gorgeous, the price for a bike of this quality is a real bargain. Every minute on this bike is shear ecstasy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Laighton

customer_reviews.title: Great Road Bike for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: The Tommaso Imola Endurance Aluminum Road Bike offers a great lightweight bike at a phenomenally affordable price. It offers 24 speeds that shift pretty easy (after a couple minor tweaks), and excellent braking. I'm using clipless pedals with beginner cleats, and I'm getting pretty good after only a couple days of use. I'm looking forward to some great rides!
customer_reviews.author: Camera Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bike for the price could compare with any ...
customer_reviews.text: Good looking bike for the price could compare with any of the expensive easy to assemble and if need more directions look in the net I bought the installation package but at the end didn't get it because it was open to any charge and that's not fair. Pay the high cost of a" bicycle mechanic".
customer_reviews.author: Juliocamacho

customer_reviews.title: First road bike
customer_reviews.text: Impressed so far. Rides comfortably. The brakes required some adjusting from my local shop, and the seat had to be swapped out. But the bike itself is very nice, it's a joy to ride it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.text: The worst purchasing experience I’ve ever had. A complete nightmare. Save your time, and order direct from tommaso. Product came damaged, sent it back and had a horrible time getting a refund. Once my refund processed I ordered another bike. Also arrived damaged. Tied up 600 bucks, and a month of my time was wasted. The bike seemed nice, wish I could’ve taken it for a spin.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Joy

customer_reviews.title: Over 1,000 miles now. No issues. Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike in NH in preparation for moving to Southern California. Planned on using it as my commuter. I’m over 1,000 miles on this bike with Zero issues. Needed new (better) tires pretty quickly though. Tires on it are not going to last you more than 300 -400 I’d say.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: For a budget bike you really can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: For a budget bike you really can't go wrong. Just had to do some minor tuning and truing of the wheels when it arrived and it was ready to go. Add your favorite arrow-bar setup and you have a cheap (and capable) TRI bike too.
customer_reviews.author: outwestbowhunter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new bike. Took it to local bike shop for professional assembly and they were in shock that I purchased such a great bike like this on amazon. Very easy to use, fit is perfect and I’ve been enjoying every moment.
customer_reviews.author: Fi

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son who is just starting into road biking. He loves the bike and uses it each day for commuting. It came pre-assembled enough that it could be completed without a bike mechanic but having the service available was a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: M Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the on time delivery and the easiness of assembly of the bike. I have been riding over 50 years and competed in the 1970's and early 1980's. The Tommaso Imola bike is an amazing bicycle and put together well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Bike is freaking awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Bike is pretty good and light, now i can bike with those carbon fiber biker . Should bought it when the price is still $549 not $599..
customer_reviews.author: Marlon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Husband is just getting into riding and riding long distances. He can take this bike put for 50 miles and it holds up great. He loves it. Considering getting one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Tomblin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble and later find out defected
customer_reviews.text: I spent 45 mins to put on the handle bars, the seat and the brake , the figure out the frame was damaged .. now what do I do I assembly and return?? Very sad
customer_reviews.author: I say what i mean it

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice starter bike. It has the expensive bike gears and break shifters. I had to change the handle bar bracket, due to it was too long. My lean was too far forward and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: N Gee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent commuting bike
customer_reviews.text: I use this bike to commute between work and college. It is great for beginners who want to have an easy riding experience. It is phenomenal when climbing steep hills or flying down hill with a cool breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Reddell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Road Bike for those who ride a lot or once in a while-
customer_reviews.author: jas

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this bike. Came virtually assembled and was easy to put together out of the box. I did have to get clipless pedals separately though.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Yanpolski

customer_reviews.title: A definite buy! I'm new to cycling, but ...
customer_reviews.text: A definite buy! I'm new to cycling, but this bike definitely lives up to all the reviews, and my research really paid off! If you want to get into cycling, ypu can't go wrong, just make sure you get the right size frame
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice road bicyclist and road this on a 150 mile bike ride for charity. The bike performed well. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. I would recommend this for someone looking to get into the sport! The set up they give you is good. However after having it for a year I have upgraded to better wheels and shifters as the ones that come on the bike are nothing to brag about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but so far it's been great. I can't wait to keep riding
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this bike for a short time, but so far it's been great. I can't wait to keep riding. I think it's a great bike to get started
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Castro

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bike, came pretty much assembled. Been riding it on concrete trails for a many months now. Didn't even take it to a shop for tuning just put air in the tires and it was good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ando

customer_reviews.title: What a bike for the Money
customer_reviews.text: The bike is an excellent value. Good looking, performs excellent. Also the free install at the house is a great savings
customer_reviews.author: Gary Strah

customer_reviews.title: Great bike.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is my first road bike, happy with it. Tried putting it together but the gears didn't switch correctly. Brought it into the local bike shop and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lundvall

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, ok wheels
customer_reviews.text: This is my first road bike and I’m really happy with the purchase. Shifts smooth, breaking is solid, and handles well. Knocking it down a star as wheels are not the best. Spent $25 to fix the wheels and I plan to replace them for something better later on.
customer_reviews.author: Hkim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike itself is beautifully designed, with good componentes that make the ride a nice experience. Best value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Readalot

customer_reviews.title: it feels stable and made with good quality. The free shipping to performance bikes was ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only gone 1 mile since receiving the bike. I have not been on a bike in 20 years. Overall, it feels stable and made with good quality. The free shipping to performance bikes was amazing! I will use that service again. Now just need to build confidence and get out there. BTW- my wife says it’s a sexy bike
customer_reviews.author: Brook Elkins

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME bike!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME bike!! This is my entry level road bike, and I love it!! I am loving the sport, and this bike endures!! I am so happy with how it rides that I look to stick with Tommaso for my next road bike.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike will recommend this brand to everyone! Two of my friends actually bought this bike since I let them ride mine!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: After 100 miles of riding, excellent bike for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Cortlandt Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ... bike for about a month and am more than satisfied. Rides like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Have had this bike for about a month and am more than satisfied. Rides like a dream. Very easy to maneuver👌
customer_reviews.author: EJ_Mandigo-Kneszewski

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bike for a beginner. I enjoy it lot. It very light bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: If it ever breaks, I'm not buying anything else. I would get another imola.
customer_reviews.author: Jcamp

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in four days. Beautiful bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is gorgeous! I had a friend assemble but ended up taking it to a bike shop for professional tweaking after breaking the chain while going up a paved hill. It now rides perfectly..
customer_reviews.author: lisa massolio

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great bike and value. poorly packaged. Bike came scratched and package was open no one replied to My emails at customer support
customer_reviews.author: Vytenis K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Road Bike
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable quality for a great price. You can't beat the value.
customer_reviews.author: DJMoore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bike!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike at an amazing price! Incredible price for the value! I was able to set up and take it out for a ride within an hour of receiving it. This is my first road bike and as an entry level bike I can't recommend this enough to someone getting into the sport. The groupset and build quality is far beyond price point.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The bike will require fine tuning by a professional, unless you can do it yourself. I could not.
customer_reviews.author: David Baliu-Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: the box was opened and damaged at the delivery time
customer_reviews.text: The box was opened and damaged at the delivery time, I will let you know if there are not missing or damaged parts
customer_reviews.author: manuel maravilla

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner bike
customer_reviews.text: Nice beginning road bike with good components. Cannot fit two bottle cages so hard for long rides where more fluids are necessary
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Better assembly Instx would be nice
customer_reviews.text: Bike seems fine. Assembly was ridiculous as it came with zero instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Oren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can not believe how nice this bike is for the price. Outstanding thank you
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: fit is great, ride is great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered after doing some research... fit is great, ride is great... for the money it's a five purchase
customer_reviews.author: Angela Prout

customer_reviews.title: You guys should check every thing before shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought tube for this bike case of not working tube
customer_reviews.author: Kiros

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for a Beginner!
customer_reviews.text: A great entry-level bike. Getting back into cycling after 5 years, I had to give this bike a shot. Took it to the local bike shop to get assembled and have already knocked out 40 miles over the past week. Do not assume just because of the low price that the components are of lower quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good bike and components for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bike came with a slightly wobbly front rim/tire. Took it to the shop, they told me that that's what I get for buying a bike at this price point. The wobble is barely noticeable but it's still there and gets annoying when I think about it. I may try to balance out the wheel myself (bike shop couldn't do it) axially, perhaps that will fix the wobble, if not then will have to invest in some new wheels, wheels are always a good investment. Another thing is that I wish the stickers came off...
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first road bike, I'm really enjoying it. Great bike!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Sweet spot for quality and money.
customer_reviews.text: Good bike for the money. From a distance you can't evevn tell it's aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good beginners road bike. Lightweight, attractive and fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike in March of 2017 and currently have 525 miles (July 4th of the time of this review), it's my first nice bike and I am very pleased with it. My area I bike in is Utah so it's always hilly but this bike is really good for climbs and also a good flat stretch cruise. I've have had no serious issues beside the seat being a thing of medieval torture device for heathens and breaking 3 spokes on the rear wheel. Overall I'm am pleased with this bike and recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: Jake Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is light and fast. Shifting is smooth with the Shimano group set and the brakes work beautifully. This bike also looks very appealing and catches a lot of eyes whenever I take it for a spin. I would definitely recommend this bike, can't find a better bike for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: I would get another Tommaso
customer_reviews.text: Bike comes partially assembled and ready to use, the design of the bike is really good and everyone likes it, it looks like an expensive bike. It shipped really fast and it was well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker than expected. Easy to assemble. Good entry level performance bike or commuter.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bike. I wanted a good ride with reliable shifting for a decent price. I believe I got exactly that. I had a bike store put it together then switched out the seat and pedals for personal preference items.
customer_reviews.author: Made to Worship

customer_reviews.title: Great entry-level road bike
customer_reviews.text: Great entry-level road bike. Very light and fast. I was initially wary of the burnt-orange but it looks pretty nice in person.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Farver

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first olympic triathlon with this bike and felt like I owed it to Amazon and Tommaso to write them a solid review. This is a great bike. Assembly was easy, I took it to a bike store to have it looked at before I ever rode it. I haven't had any issues so far and I ride it about 3-4 times a week w/ long 15+mi rides on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've only ridden this bike once since I've gotten it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only ridden this bike once since I've gotten it, but I got it crazy early! It arrived seven days before I was expecting it! This is my very first road bike, so I don't have anything to compare it to, but I have no complaints thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Souder

customer_reviews.title: Me gusta!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new road bike, fast shipping and good quality, just note that if you don't have any knowledge of how to assemble this bike, thenyou have to go to a bike shop and see a professional to set it up for you.
customer_reviews.author: Fredy

customer_reviews.title: This bike looks great and my 18 -year old son likes it very ...
customer_reviews.text: This bike looks great and my 18 -year old son likes it very much.The installer Jon was very nice and did a great job.Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bike, received it within a week. Im not sure why people complain about the wobbly wheels, mine came out fine. Must have gotten lucky. Tires were a bit funky, so I replaced them with continental gator shells. Bike is fast, rides smooth and, shifts well. Its a pretty sexy looking bike too, I had to wait for my faghettaboutit mini ubolt to get here before I could lock it up. Im a newbie, and if you are too get this bike youll treasure it. At least until you run it into the ground like I plan to.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail O.

customer_reviews.title: great intro road bike
customer_reviews.text: Light, handles well, great intro road bike. Just completed a century with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bike. Can't beat the price, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price for with the bike comes with, but there are some downfalls. As like suggested with other reviews you should bring this flag to your local bike shop and have it tuned. Unfortunately, even after bringing it to my local bike shop my Derailleur for the front rings isn't working properly. I have taken it now to multiple shops and none can get them working correctly. Everything else about the bike I love I will be purchasing another bike and using this one as a practice bike.
customer_reviews.author: BankOnMe

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, regardless of the price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, no damage, well packaged and easy to assemble. Love the colors and build. Rides smooth right out of the box. If you are looking to get in to riding for fitness, this is a great ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jediahmiller2

customer_reviews.title: Like the bike
customer_reviews.text: Like the bike, but the left shifter is not smooth and is often very hard to do. Right is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ma ware

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for my nephew. A couple of days ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my nephew. A couple of days later, one pedal broke. And it is NOT covered by the warranty. My nephew wants me to make an correction: the crank arm striped when he FIRST TIME ride it.
customer_reviews.author: NormalGuy

customer_reviews.title: Recieved my bike today and was sorely disappointed Its cheaply made and i was expecting some type ...
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my bike today and was sorely disappointed Its cheaply made and i was expecting some type of workmanship for $500 bike I would of been better off with a $299 schwinn Handlebar tape is already lose and poorly wrapped Bike came with some very low buget pedals Somthing you will find on a $150 bike I would not pay more than $250 or less for this bike Next time i will just go to Walmart to get a bike like this
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the nicest bike I've ever owned, it ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the nicest bike I've ever owned, it lives up to its hype and even surpasses it id say. Would definitely buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great box bike. A good deal for a first road bike entry.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Amador

product_meta.title: Tommaso Imola Endurance Aluminum Road Bike, Shimano Claris R2000, 24 Speeds, Black, White, Burnt Orange
feature_bullets: YOU DON’T NEED TO SPEND MORE: Because Tommaso is a direct to the consumer brand you can now get a bike with 100% Shimano gears, super lightweight aluminum frame, and lightweight wheels for an amazing value. Tommaso gives you value like no other brand. We provide a lifetime frame warranty and great service through our U.S. based customer service team.

THE IMOLA IS AFFORDABLE PERFORMANCE, NOT ENTRY LEVEL: If you are just getting into cycling or returning after a long hiatus, this is your bike. New and returning cyclists don’t need “beginner bikes”, that won’t meet your needs or last. You deserve affordable performance! The Imola embodies the idea of affordable performance with a full Shimano groupset you hope is on bikes costing $100’s more. Compare the Imola’s specs with any bike, and you will see the difference between us and the competition

STEP UP TO THE BRAND NEW SHIMANO CLARIS R2000: The Shifters, Derailleurs, Crank, and Brakes are all new 2018 Claris. R2000 Claris STI shifters now mimic 105 and Tiagra components up the line. Cables are routed under the bar for a clean look that shifts perfectly. Only bikes with integrated shifters and brake levers will perform at optimal levels. Don’t be fooled by imitators using off-brand cranks or shifters, they aren’t optimized for Shimano gearing and can’t deliver precision shifting.

YOU DESERVE A COMFORTABLE RIDE: Our compact frame geometry offers a more relaxed position for all riding styles, with a shallow handlebar drop so that you can still be comfortable when riding in the lower handlebar position. We even added extra control on turns by equipping the Imola with wider 25mm, 700c road bike tires. Every part of the Imola is designed for maximum comfort and efficiency, so that you can get the most out of every ride

BUILT TO LAST: All too often things are made cheaply and break before their time. We believe that bikes should be reliable and built to last. This is why we use the highest quality aluminum in our bikes, and back it with our industry leading lifetime warranty. We also use only Shimano components, which are backed up with Shimano’s two year warranty and are designed function better and last longer than anything else on the market. Ride with confidence, knowing your new bike was built to last!
